verses.verse: And an angel <WH4397> of the LORD <WH3068> came <WH5927> up from Gilgal <WH1537> to Bochim, <WH1066> and said, <WH559> I made you to go <WH5927> up out of Egypt, <WH4714> and have brought <WH935> you to the land <WH776> which <WH834> I swore <WH7650> to your fathers; <WH1> and I said, <WH559> I will never <WH3808> <WH5769> break <WH6565> my covenant <WH1285> with you.

And you shall make <WH3772> no <WH3808> league <WH1285> with the inhabitants <WH3427> of this <WH2063> land; <WH776> you shall throw <WH5422> down <WH5422> their altars: <WH4196> but you have not obeyed <WH8085> my voice: <WH6963> why <WH4100> have you done <WH6213> this? <WH2063>

Why I also <WH1571> said, <WH559> I will not drive <WH1644> them out from before <WH6440> you; but they shall be as thorns in your sides, <WH6654> and their gods <WH430> shall be a snare <WH4170> to you.

And it came <WH1961> to pass, when the angel <WH4397> of the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> these <WH428> words <WH1697> to all <WH3605> the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> that the people <WH5971> lifted <WH5375> up their voice, <WH6963> and wept. <WH1058>
And they called <WH7121> the name <WH8034> of that place <WH4725> Bochim: <WH1066> and they sacrificed <WH2076> there <WH8033> to the LORD. <WH3068>

And when Joshua <WH3091> had let the people <WH5971> go, <WH7971> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> went <WH3212> every man <WH376> to his inheritance <WH5159> to possess <WH3423> the land. <WH776>

And the people <WH5971> served <WH5647> the LORD <WH3068> all <WH3605> the days <WH3117> of Joshua, <WH3091> and all <WH3605> the days <WH3117> of the elders <WH2205> that outlived <WH748> Joshua, <WH3091> who <WH834> had seen <WH7200> all <WH3605> the great <WH1419> works <WH4639> of the LORD, <WH3068> that he did <WH6213> for Israel. <WH3478>
And Joshua <WH3091>the son <WH1121> of Nun, <WH5126> the servant <WH5650> of the LORD, <WH3068> died, <WH4191> being an hundred <WH3967> and ten <WH6235> years <WH8141> old. <WH1121>

And they buried <WH6912> him in the border <WH1366> of his inheritance <WH5159> in Timnathheres, <WH8556> in the mount <WH2022> of Ephraim, <WH669> on the north <WH6828> side of the hill <WH2022> Gaash. <WH1608>

And also <WH1571> all <WH3605> that generation <WH1755> were gathered <WH622> to their fathers: <WH1> and there arose <WH6965> another <WH312> generation <WH1755> after <WH310> them, which <WH834> knew <WH3045> not the LORD, <WH3068> nor <WH1571> yet <WH1571> the works <WH4639> which <WH834> he had done <WH6213> for Israel. <WH3478>
And the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> did <WH6213> evil <WH7451> in the sight <WH5869> of the LORD, <WH3068> and served <WH5647> Baalim: <WH1168>

And they forsook <WH5800> the LORD <WH3068> God <WH430> of their fathers, <WH1> which brought <WH3318> them out of the land <WH776> of Egypt, <WH4714> and followed <WH3212> <WH310> other <WH312> gods, <WH430> of the gods <WH430> of the people <WH5971> that were round <WH5439> about them, and bowed <WH7812> themselves to them, and provoked the LORD <WH3068> to anger. <WH3707>
And they forsook <WH5800> the LORD, <WH3068> and served <WH5647> Baal <WH1168> and Ashtaroth. <WH6252>

And the anger <WH639> of the LORD <WH3068> was hot <WH2734> against Israel, <WH3478> and he delivered <WH5414> them into the hands <WH3027> of spoilers <WH8154> that spoiled <WH8155> them, and he sold <WH4376> them into the hands <WH3027> of their enemies <WH341> round <WH5439> about, so that they could <WH3201> not any longer <WH5750> stand <WH5975> before <WH6440> their enemies. <WH341>

Wherever <WH3605> <WH834> they went <WH3318> out, the hand <WH3027> of the LORD <WH3068> was against them for evil, <WH7451> as the LORD <WH3068> had said, <WH1696> and as the LORD <WH3068> had sworn <WH7650> to them: and they were greatly <WH3966> distressed. <WH3334>
Nevertheless the LORD <WH3068> raised <WH6965> up judges, <WH8199> which delivered <WH3467> them out of the hand <WH3027> of those that spoiled <WH8154> them.

And yet <WH1571> they would not listen <WH8085> to their judges, <WH8199> but they went a whoring <WH2181> after <WH310> other <WH312> gods, <WH430> and bowed <WH7812> themselves to them: they turned <WH5493> quickly <WH4118> out of the way <WH1870> which <WH834> their fathers <WH1> walked <WH1980> in, obeying <WH8085> the commandments <WH4687> of the LORD; <WH3068> but they did <WH6213> not so. <WH3651>

And when <WH3588> the LORD <WH3068> raised <WH6965> them up judges, <WH8199> then the LORD <WH3068> was with the judge, <WH8199> and delivered <WH3467> them out of the hand <WH3027> of their enemies <WH341> all <WH3605> the days <WH3117> of the judge: <WH8199> for it repented <WH5162> the LORD <WH3068> because <WH6440> of their groanings <WH5009> by reason of them that oppressed <WH3905> them and vexed <WH1766> them.

And it came <WH1961> to pass, when the judge <WH8199> was dead, <WH4191> that they returned, <WH7725> and corrupted <WH7843> themselves more than their fathers, <WH1> in following <WH3212> <WH310> other <WH312> gods <WH430> to serve <WH5647> them, and to bow <WH7812> down <WH7812> to them; they ceased <WH5307> not from their own doings, <WH4611> nor from their stubborn <WH7186> way. <WH1870>

And the anger <WH639> of the LORD <WH3068> was hot <WH2734> against Israel; <WH3478> and he said, <WH559> Because <WH3282> that this <WH2088> people <WH1471> has transgressed <WH5674> my covenant <WH1285> which <WH834> I commanded <WH6680> their fathers, <WH1> and have not listened <WH8085> to my voice; <WH6963>
I also <WH1571> will not from now on <WH3254> drive <WH3423> out any from before <WH6440> them of the nations <WH1471> which <WH834> Joshua <WH3091> left <WH5800> when he died: <WH4191>

That through them I may prove <WH5254> Israel, <WH3478> whether they will keep <WH8104> the way <WH1870> of the LORD <WH3068> to walk <WH3212> therein, as their fathers <WH1> did keep <WH8104> it, or not.

Therefore the LORD <WH3068> left <WH5117> those <WH428> nations, <WH1471> without <WH1115> driving <WH3423> them out hastily; <WH4118> neither <WH3808> delivered <WH5414> he them into the hand <WH3027> of Joshua. <WH3091>
